Uses of Class
org.hibernate.engine.jdbc.Size

  • Packages that use Size 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.engine.jdbc
    Support for various aspects of JDBC interaction
    org.hibernate.persister.entity
    This package abstracts persistence mechanisms for entities, and defines the Hibernate runtime metamodel.
    org.hibernate.type
    A Hibernate Type is a strategy for mapping a Java property type to a JDBC type or types.
    org.hibernate.usertype
    Interfaces for user-defined custom types.

      Methods in org.hibernate.usertype that return Size 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Size[] Sized.defaultSizes()
